spirit:addressBlock.spirit:name: some_register_map
spirit:addressBlock.spirit:description: This address map contains some example registers to show how RDL can be utilized in various situations.

spirit:field.spirit:name: FNCLKSEL15
spirit:field.spirit:description: functional clock select 0x0 = 58.5 mhz 0x1 = 14.7456 mhz all other values = reserved, do not use

spirit:field.spirit:name: RST17
spirit:field.spirit:description: uart reset generation this field resets both apb and functional domains. 0 = no reset 1 = reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: FNCLK18
spirit:field.spirit:description: uart functional clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on

spirit:field.spirit:name: APBCLK19
spirit:field.spirit:description: uart apb bus clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on

spirit:field.spirit:name: FNCLKSEL27
spirit:field.spirit:description: functional clock select 0x0 = 58.5 mhz 0x1 = 14.7456 mhz all other values = reserved, do not use

spirit:field.spirit:name: RST29
spirit:field.spirit:description: uart reset generation this field resets both apb and functional domains. 0 = no reset 1 = reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: FNCLK30
spirit:field.spirit:description: uart functional clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on

spirit:field.spirit:name: APBCLK31
spirit:field.spirit:description: uart apb bus clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on

spirit:field.spirit:name: FNCLKSEL39
spirit:field.spirit:description: functional clock select 0x0 to 0x7 = no clock

spirit:field.spirit:name: RST41
spirit:field.spirit:description: gpio reset generation this field resets both the apb and functional domain. 0 = no reset 1 = reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: FNCLK42
spirit:field.spirit:description: gpio functional clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on

spirit:field.spirit:name: APBCLK43
spirit:field.spirit:description: gpio apb bus clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on

spirit:field.spirit:name: FNCLKSEL52
spirit:field.spirit:description: functional clock select 0x0 = 13 mhz 0x1 = 32 khz all other values = reserved, do not use

spirit:field.spirit:name: RST54
spirit:field.spirit:description: pwm 0 reset generation this field resets both the apb and functional domain. 0 = no reset 1 = reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: FNCLK55
spirit:field.spirit:description: pwm 0 functional clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on

spirit:field.spirit:name: APBCLK56
spirit:field.spirit:description: pwm 0/1 apb bus clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on. this bit controls the apb clocks for both pwm0 and pwm1.

spirit:field.spirit:name: FNCLKSEL65
spirit:field.spirit:description: functional clock select 0x0 = 13 mhz 0x1 = 32 khz all other values = reserved, do not use

spirit:field.spirit:name: RST67
spirit:field.spirit:description: pwm 1 reset generation this field resets both the apb and functional domain. 0 = no reset 1 = reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: FNCLK68
spirit:field.spirit:description: pwm 1 functional clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on

spirit:field.spirit:name: FNCLKSEL78
spirit:field.spirit:description: functional clock select 0x0 = 13 mhz 0x1 = 32 khz all other values = reserved, do not use

spirit:field.spirit:name: RST80
spirit:field.spirit:description: pwm 2 reset generation this field resets both the apb and functional domain. 0 = no reset 1 = reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: FNCLK81
spirit:field.spirit:description: pwm 2 functional clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on

spirit:field.spirit:name: APBCLK82
spirit:field.spirit:description: pwm 2/3 apb bus clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on. this bit controls the apb clocks for both pwm2 and pwm3.

spirit:field.spirit:name: FNCLKSEL91
spirit:field.spirit:description: functional clock select 0x0 = 13 mhz 0x1 = 32 khz all other values = reserved, do not use

spirit:field.spirit:name: RST93
spirit:field.spirit:description: pwm 3 reset generation this field resets both the apb and functional domain. 0 = no reset 1 = reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: FNCLK94
spirit:field.spirit:description: pwm 3 functional clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on

spirit:field.spirit:name: SEL_SSP_FUNC_CLK104
spirit:field.spirit:description: ac97 clock switch this bit enables the ssp module to switch clocks internally.

spirit:field.spirit:name: FNCLKSEL105
spirit:field.spirit:description: functional clock select 0x0 = 6.5 mhz 0x1 = 13 mhz 0x2 = 26 mhz 0x3 = 52 mhz 0x4 = 3.25 mhz 0x5 = 1.625 mhz 0x6 = 812.5 khz all other values = reserved, do not use

spirit:field.spirit:name: RST107
spirit:field.spirit:description: ssp 0 reset generation this field resets both the apb and functional domain. 0 = no reset 1 = reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: FNCLK108
spirit:field.spirit:description: ssp 0 functional clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on

spirit:field.spirit:name: APBCLK109
spirit:field.spirit:description: ssp 0 apb bus clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on

spirit:register.spirit:name: APBC_IPC_CLK_RST
spirit:register.spirit:description: Clock/Reset Control Register for Inter-Processor Communication

spirit:field.spirit:name: FNCLKSEL119
spirit:field.spirit:description: functional clock select all values = no clock

spirit:field.spirit:name: RST121
spirit:field.spirit:description: inter-processor communication (ipc) reset generation this field resets both the apb and functional domain. 0 = no reset 1 = reset

spirit:field.spirit:description: ipc functional clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on

spirit:field.spirit:name: APBCLK123
spirit:field.spirit:description: ipc apb bus clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on

spirit:field.spirit:name: PM_POWER_SENSOR
spirit:field.spirit:description: power enabled this field enables the register read/writes for the rtc module by indicating power enable. set this field to 0x1 before enabling rtc operations.

spirit:field.spirit:description: functional clock select 0x0 = 32 khz all other values = reserved, do not use

spirit:field.spirit:description: rtc reset generation this field resets both the apb and functional domain. 0 = no reset 1 = reset

spirit:field.spirit:description: rtc functional clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on

spirit:field.spirit:name: APBCLK136
spirit:field.spirit:description: rtc apb bus clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on

spirit:field.spirit:description: functional clock select 0x0 = 32 mhz 0x1 = 52 mhz 0x2 = 62.4 mhz all other values = reserved, do not use

spirit:field.spirit:description: twsi reset generation this field resets both the apb and functional domain. 0 = no reset 1 = reset

spirit:field.spirit:description: twsi0 functional clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on

spirit:field.spirit:name: APBCLK148
spirit:field.spirit:description: twsi0 apb bus clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on

spirit:field.spirit:description: functional clock select all values = no clock

spirit:field.spirit:description: ssp 2 apb bus clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on

spirit:field.spirit:name: ASFAR
spirit:field.spirit:description: first access key writing the value of 0xbaba to this register will match the key. this register will get cleared to 0x0 when one secure access is completed.

spirit:field.spirit:name: ASSAR
spirit:field.spirit:description: section access key writing the value of 0xeb10 to this register will match the key. this register will get cleared to 0x0 when one secure access is completed.

spirit:field.spirit:name: RST259
spirit:field.spirit:description: dro reset generation this field resets both the apb and functional domain. 0 = no reset 1 = reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: APBCLK261
spirit:field.spirit:description: dro apb bus clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on

spirit:field.spirit:name: FNCLKSEL269
spirit:field.spirit:description: functional clock select 0x0 = 32 mhz 0x1 = 52 mhz 0x2 = 62.4 mhz all other values = reserved, do not use

spirit:field.spirit:name: RST271
spirit:field.spirit:description: twsi reset generation this field resets both the apb and functional domain. 0 = no reset 1 = reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: FNCLK272
spirit:field.spirit:description: twsi functional clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on

spirit:field.spirit:name: APBCLK273
spirit:field.spirit:description: twsi apb bus clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on

spirit:register.spirit:name: APBC_COUNTER_CLK_SEL
spirit:register.spirit:description: Clock Control Register for Generic Counter

spirit:field.spirit:name: LOW_FREQ_STEP
spirit:field.spirit:description: generic counter step of low frequency under low frequency, this is the generic counter step value. its default is 26 mhz/32768 = 0x319

spirit:field.spirit:name: FREQ_SW_SEL
spirit:field.spirit:description: generic counter frequency software select if freq_hw_en = 0 generic counter clock frequency select 0x0 = 26 mhz 1 = 32 khz

spirit:field.spirit:name: FREQ_HW_CTRL
spirit:field.spirit:description: generic counter frequency controlled by hardware 0x0 = software freq_sw_sel bit 1 = hardware vctcxo_en signal if vctcxo_en = 1, generic counter clock frequency is 26 mhz if vctcxo_en = 0, generic counter clock frequency is 32 khz

spirit:field.spirit:name: FNCLKSEL292
spirit:field.spirit:description: functional clock select 0x0 = 13 mhz 0x1 = 32 khz 0x2 = 6.5 mhz 0x3 = 3.25 mhz 0x4 = 1 mhz all other values = reserved, do not use

spirit:field.spirit:name: RST294
spirit:field.spirit:description: timers 1 reset generation this field resets both the apb and functional domain. 0 = no reset 1 = reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: FNCLK295
spirit:field.spirit:description: timers 1 functional clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on

spirit:field.spirit:name: APBCLK296
spirit:field.spirit:description: timers 1 apb bus clock enable/disable 0 = clock off 1 = clock on

spirit:register.spirit:name: APBC_TSEN_CLK_RST
spirit:register.spirit:description: Clock/Reset Control Register for Temperature Sensor

spirit:field.spirit:name: TSEN_RST_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: temperature sensor reset enable 0x0 = release reset 0x1 = reset temperature sensor

spirit:field.spirit:name: TSEN_FCLK_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: temperature sensor function clock enable 0x0 = disable temperature sensor function clock 1 = enable temperature sensor function clock

spirit:field.spirit:name: TSEN_PCLK_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: temperature sensor apb clock enable 0x0 = disable temperature sensor apb clock 1 = enable temperature sensor apb clock
